name: FashionAmbitions
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Fashion Ambitions is a fashion publication that provides substance and in-depth insights for women with an interest in fashion, beauty and lifestyle.

Online, we reach more than 100k readers each month and have an engaged and growing social media fanbase of more than 80k followers.

Fashion Ambitions was founded in 2010 by Romana Hai, a creative director, writer and digital entrepreneur. Fashion Ambitions began as a project of passion, aiming to fill the void for an informed, analytical and opinionated point of view on the fashion.

Today, the website has grown to leverage a network of savvy writers, delivering fashion advice through a variety of mixed features, thoughtful essays, attitude given news and insight.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
